cast.name: 马修·麦克诺提 Matthew McNulty
奥利维娅·科尔曼 Olivia Colman

this_title: The Great War: The People's Story
trans_title: 世界大战：普通人的故事
introduction: The Great War: The People's Story Based on real letters... This landmark drama documentary series is the definitive account of five extraordinary years that changed Britain for ever. World War 1 through the eyes of ordinary people - strong, engaging and identifiable characters based on unheard diaries and accounts. Great stories for a prime time audience an unparalleled era of social change captured in the remarkable stories of our characters. Britain's biggest and brightest acting talent a powerful cast delivering their stories in a compelling drama that unfolds across 4 parts. Big-scale reconstructions key events vividly captured to show the old Edwardian world order collapsing as a new modern Britain emerges. Definitive - an authentic, accessible and original way for ITV to mark the centenary of the Great War.
chinese_title: 世界大战：普通人的故事
foreign_title: The Great War: The People's Story
